system.description: A wired jack hooked directly into the user’s brain, so the character can mentally control and input text or sound to external computers and devices via thought commands, as well as receive computer information back. It allows the user to enter cyberspace mode, in which all their senses are replaced with the computer-generated input. Otherwise, the user can see the input through cybernetic eyes or a HUD, or “hear” audio and text from the computer mentally.
system.shortdescr: Wired computer jack hooked directly into the user’s brain.
